title: hexo基本配置
text: hexo文档https://hexo.bootcss.com/docs/ 安装hexo:1npm install -g hexo-cli 初始化:1hexo init blog 启动:1hexo s 生成文件1hexo g 更新仓库1hexo d 清除缓存:1hexo clean 关联git:1cnpm install --save hexo-deployer-git 配置config文件:123type: gitrepo: https://gitee.com/cl1169451697/chenlong.gitbranch: master 配置_config文件12root: chenlong.giturl: https://gitee.com/cl1169451697/chenlong.git 常用博客样式:12https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yiliagit clone https://gitee.com/cl1169451697/hexo-theme-BlueLake.git themes/yilia 修改_config.yml:themes: 设置为下载的主题名字

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
